Description: You won_t get a view like this at any other Las Vegas pool. Soleil is located right underneath the hotel_s Eiffel Tower replica, positioned in the heart of the Strip. Relax in the provided, first-come-first-served lounge chairs and soak up the rays in this quiet, two-acre utopia. Reminiscent of a Parisian garden, the refreshing pool, spa and expansive deck offer cocktail service and plush amenities.If hunger strikes, grab a bite at the Caf‚ du Parc. Further the indulgence by splurging on a poolside massage with attendants from the hotel_s Mandara Spa. Rent a shaded cabana for the day for a memorable VIP-style experience.EXPERT TIPSSunbathe with a view of several Strip landmarksKeep cool with frozen vodka lemonadePrivate cabana sanctuaries Can be booked for private events or parties
Location: 3655 Las Vegas Boulevard South Las Vegas , NV 89109
